media.altText: See Your Mystery Tasks When you join the new beauty insider challenge. Join the challenge > ^$50 min spend required and terms apply.

Three skincare products—EXTREME CREAM, SOFT PAVITT FACE, and ULTRA VIOLETTE—are shown with texture samples behind them. Text reads: “TOP DERM & ESTHETICIAN PICKS. Targeted formulas by experts—only at Sephora. SHOP NOW.”

Purple background with gold text: “SHARE YOUR LOVES LIST. Make all the lists you want, then drop hints to friends and family. CREATE YOUR LIST.” Includes a gold bow on a purple gift box, a gold sequin heart, and a small gold star.

Image for rhode Glazing Milk. Text reads: “Shop the viral Glazing Milk for glowy skin and hydrating makeup prep. SHOP NOW.” Shows a bottle labeled “rhode” next to a glass being filled with white liquid.

Image promoting MAED lip care. Text reads: “Swipe on MAED. Luxe lip care that smooths, hydrates, and visibly fades dark spots. SHOP NOW.” Four lip products shown: two gold tubes, one red tube, and one white tube with red text.
SAVE 5% WITH AUTO-REPLENISH^^ | Never run out of skincare with subscription delivery. LEARN MORE > | 5% OFF^^ | ^^Terms apply. | Icon of blue cleanser bottle.

data.seoContent:
Put your best face forward with high-performance skin care. Our range of skin care products cleanses, treats, moisturizes, & protects with results-driven formulas & powerful ingredients. Thirsty skin? Keep skin hydrated with our [hyaluronic acid skin care products|/hyaluronic-acid-skincare-products]. Breaking out? Combat acne with our [salicylic acid skin care products|/salicylic-acid-skincare-products]. Fine lines & wrinkles giving you a hard time? [Alpha hydroxy acids skincare products|/alpha-hydroxy-acids-skincare-products] are your new BFF. For deeper exfoliation browse [glycolic acid skin care products|/glycolic-acid-skincare-products] or [lactic acid skin care products|/lactic-acid-skincare-products] if you have sensitive or dry skin. Can't solve your anti-aging skin puzzle? Let our [retinoid skin care products|/retinoids-skincare-products] find the missing piece. Don’t feel like negotiating with your skin when it comes to collagen production? Keep skin firm and tight with our [vitamin C skin care products|/vitamin-c-skincare-products]. Discover the +[best sunscreens|/beauty/best-sunscreen|color=blue]+ to protect your skin now! Interested in Teen Skincare? Check out our +[Teen Skincare Resource Guide|/beauty/teens-tweens-skincare|color=blue]+.
  
Interested in learning how to achieve your skincare goals? Check out our +[skincare classes|/happening/classes|color=blue]+ or +[skincare events|/happening/events|color=blue]+ to see if there are any available at a Sephora location near you!
data.seoMetaDescription: Shop skincare products at Sephora. Find top-rated products from leading skincare brands to help target specific skin concerns and revitalize your look.

itemListElement.name: Makeup
itemListElement.description: Shop the best makeup now at Sephora and earn points with every purchase! Not yet a Beauty Insider? Join now for FREE!

itemListElement.name: Skincare
itemListElement.description: Shop skincare products at Sephora. Find top-rated products from leading skincare brands to help target specific skin concerns and revitalize your look.

itemListElement.name: Hair
itemListElement.description: Explore our top-rated hair care products at Sephora. Browse an unrivaled selection of shampoos, conditioners, styling products, hair color and more from top brands.

itemListElement.name: Fragrance
itemListElement.description: Shop fragrances for women and men at Sephora. Find your favorite perfume or cologne or accentuate your style with a new scent.

itemListElement.name: Tools & Brushes
itemListElement.description: Shop beauty tools and accessories at Sephora. Find top-rated makeup tools, brushes, applicators, spa tools and more from leading brands.

itemListElement.name: Bath & Body
itemListElement.description: Shop bath & body products at Sephora. Find an unrivaled selection of the top moisturizers, cleansers, lotions, exfoliants, scrubs and more from top brands.

itemListElement.name: Sale
itemListElement.description: Makeup sales are always on at Sephora. Shop discounted makeup, skincare, fragrance and hair care products at Sephora today. Free shipping and samples available.

data.seoMetaContent:
Put your best face forward with high-performance skin care. Our range of skin care products cleanses, treats, moisturizes, & protects with results-driven formulas & powerful ingredients. Thirsty skin? Keep skin hydrated with our [hyaluronic acid skin care products|/hyaluronic-acid-skincare-products]. Breaking out? Combat acne with our [salicylic acid skin care products|/salicylic-acid-skincare-products]. Fine lines & wrinkles giving you a hard time? [Alpha hydroxy acids skincare products|/alpha-hydroxy-acids-skincare-products] are your new BFF. For deeper exfoliation browse [glycolic acid skin care products|/glycolic-acid-skincare-products] or [lactic acid skin care products|/lactic-acid-skincare-products] if you have sensitive or dry skin. Can't solve your anti-aging skin puzzle? Let our [retinoid skin care products|/retinoids-skincare-products] find the missing piece. Don’t feel like negotiating with your skin when it comes to collagen production? Keep skin firm and tight with our [vitamin C skin care products|/vitamin-c-skincare-products]. Discover the +[best sunscreens|/beauty/best-sunscreen|color=blue]+ to protect your skin now! Interested in Teen Skincare? Check out our +[Teen Skincare Resource Guide|/beauty/teens-tweens-skincare|color=blue]+.
  
Interested in learning how to achieve your skincare goals? Check out our +[skincare classes|/happening/classes|color=blue]+ or +[skincare events|/happening/events|color=blue]+ to see if there are any available at a Sephora location near you!
